item.description: @core But life will reestablish after a hundred million years, but if we could eliminate the atmosphere it would not. Just something I‚Äôm wondering about.
item.source:markdown: @core But life will reestablish after a hundred million years, but if we could eliminate the atmosphere it would not. Just something I‚Äôm wondering about.

item.description: @core Any ideas how that might happen? AI? Web3?
item.source:markdown: @core Any ideas how that might happen? AI? Web3?

item.description:
I wonder, if we decided to destroy the atmosphere of Earth, could we do it?

That is -- explode something so large and destructive that the atmosphere dissolved into space and left Earth as barren as Mars.

I know absolutely nothing of the physics.
item.source:markdown:
I wonder, if we decided to destroy the atmosphere of Earth, could we do it?
That is -- explode something so large and destructive that the atmosphere dissolved into space and left Earth as barren as Mars.
I know absolutely nothing of the physics.

item.description:
I have never liked the Mets mascot Mr Met and now there's Ms Met are they married or what?

Get creative, or who needs a mascot?

You could have Mayor Koch as a mascot, in an outfit with an oversized head, walking around asking How Am I Doing?

Or a cranky old Met like Casey Stengel.

Or Bella Abzug, or the Guardian Angels, Patti Smith?

I mean who came up with Mr Met?
item.source:markdown:
I have never liked the Mets mascot Mr Met and now there's Ms Met are they married or what?
Get creative, or who needs a mascot?
You could have Mayor Koch as a mascot, in an outfit with an oversized head, walking around asking How Am I Doing?
Or a cranky old Met like Casey Stengel.
Or Bella Abzug, or the Guardian Angels, Patti Smith?
I mean who came up with Mr Met?

item.description:
I love the Mets but always found the mascot -- Mr Met -- embarrassing. And then they invented a female version Are they supposed to be married?

I could imagine having a mascot who's a cranky old Casey Stengel type who says funny things like Can't anyone play this game? https://t.co/XtGFvgYKaz
item.source:markdown:
I love the Mets but always found the mascot -- Mr Met -- embarrassing. And then they invented a female version Are they supposed to be married?
I could imagine having a mascot who's a cranky old Casey Stengel type who says funny things like Can't anyone play this game? https://t.co/XtGFvgYKaz

item.description: @film_girl MSIE on the Mac in the early days of the web was much better than the Windows app.
item.source:markdown: @film_girl MSIE on the Mac in the early days of the web was much better than the Windows app.

item.description:
1/4 When Kevin Durant said the Knicks aren't cool anymore, he actually dared the next generation of NBA stars, guys in their mid-20s now, to think the Knicks are cool.

2/4 Durant, at 33, with two extremely bad moves behind him, is no longer the authority on what's cool. He's untradeable, stuck in a shit deal that he openly hates, that all began with him dissing the Knicks. (A future Melo?)

3/4 When he shit on the Knicks it was a blessing! Haha. üëè

4/4 I hate the fucking Nets, but if they were smart, they could counteract this hex by signing Melo for one or two seasons. That would spook NY fans. Make them possibly re-think the Nets (to be clear, not me).
item.source:markdown:
1/4 When Kevin Durant said the Knicks aren't cool anymore, he actually dared the next generation of NBA stars, guys in their mid-20s now, to think the Knicks are cool.
2/4 Durant, at 33, with two *extremely* bad moves behind him, is no longer the authority on what's cool. He's untradeable, stuck in a shit deal that he openly hates, that all began with him dissing the Knicks. (A future Melo?)
3/4 When he shit on the Knicks it was a blessing! Haha. üëè
4/4 I hate the fucking Nets, but if they were smart, they could counteract this hex by signing Melo for one or two seasons. That would spook NY fans. Make them possibly re-think the Nets (to be clear, not me).

item.description: @om Independent developers used to do something for Apple that they can't any longer. And you can't hire people to work inside large companies to do the kind of thing one developer with a big mind and strong will can do. Even if they had the ability it wouldn't be worth it.
item.source:markdown: @om Independent developers used to do something for Apple that they can't any longer. And you can't hire people to work inside large companies to do the kind of thing one developer with a big mind and strong will can do. Even if they had the ability it wouldn't be worth it.

item.description: Spat at, abused and run off the road: why do some people hate cyclists so much? https://t.co/cgdSzFr1Ww
item.source:markdown: Spat at, abused and run off the road: why do some people hate cyclists so much? https://t.co/cgdSzFr1Ww

item.description:
Keith Olbermann's podcast continues to go places no podcast has gone before.

I always wondered how conscious news people are that the one story 24 hours a day for 3 weeks format is turning news into nothing.

Perfect for Trump.

I caught 15 minutes of @maddow last night and couldn't stand it. She's stuck telling the same story she's been telling for five years. No wonder she wanted a break.
item.source:markdown:
Keith Olbermann's podcast continues to go places no podcast has gone before.
I always wondered how conscious news people are that the one story 24 hours a day for 3 weeks format is turning news into nothing.
Perfect for Trump.
I caught 15 minutes of @maddow last night and couldn't stand it. She's stuck telling the same story she's been telling for five years. No wonder she wanted a break.

item.description:
@SarahSquirm You can't get it at the store. I've been buying:

  1. Coke Zero

  2. Diet Dr Pepper

You can buy all the caffeine-free Diet Coke you want, but what's the point of that.
item.source:markdown:
@SarahSquirm You can't get it at the store. I've been buying:
1. Coke Zero
2. Diet Dr Pepper
You can buy all the caffeine-free Diet Coke you want, but what's the point of that.

item.description: @rswilbourn I don't like the show -- the reason GoT worked is because they developed the characters, and you got to know them before they went to war. This show is like we came in in Season 3 and we never got to know any of these people so why should I care (I don't).
item.source:markdown: @rswilbourn I don't like the show -- the reason GoT worked is because they developed the characters, and you got to know them before they went to war. This show is like we came in in Season 3 and we never got to know any of these people so why should I care (I don't).
